363800.name: Chroma Squad - Soundtrack
363800.description:
31 songs and 59 minutes of pure Chiptune music, inspired by the 80's and 90's, synthetizes, Tokusatsu opening themes and a lot of nostalgia.

Composers:
Raphael Müller
Washington Rayk
